passages.text:
Shh! You'll scare away the fishes!
[[Sorry!->Sorry]]
passages.name: Start

passages.text:
Too loud, much too loud! They can hear us breathe! They can smell our fear! What with all your stomping around and screaming at me, the fish must be be halfway down Mariana Trench by now!
[[I'll just leave->Leave]]
passages.name: Sorry

passages.text: There you go again, screaming your head off! And I thought coming out to the country would get me away from such nonsense!
passages.name: Leave
